turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello [ASSISTANT], could you order a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, [YOU]. Do you have a preference about the coffee shop?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would prefer the Starbucks on 4th south.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I am placing the order now. Where would you like me to meet you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please bring the coffee to me at my office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The barista asked if you would like a pastry as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I will pass on the pastry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order of one Caffè Mocha has been placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, I will see you soon.
